content: आलप् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> To address, speak to, converse; कमालपामि <ls>K. 164</ls>; तस्या नामधेयेन भर्त्रादेव्यालपिता <ls>V. 2</ls> addressed. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To talk with, engage in conversation with, to question; यदा कश्चित्त्वामालापयिष्यति <ls>Pt. 5</ls>, <ls n="Pt.">1. 387</ls>; <ls>K. 188.</ls>
